Nerangs.ab: barsom az māhrōy stānišn mat̰ vā̊ bē gōwišn namāz zōhr barišn pad dudīgar gām padāiš yā bē gōwišn namāz zōhr barišn pad sidīgar gām frasrūtā īžaiiā̊ namāz zōhr barišn ō ī gāh ī ābardān šawišn be gōwišn pairi.jasāi. ...

"He has to take the barsom from the māhrōy. At mat̰ vā̊, he has to advance one step and bring namāz to the zōhr. With the second stept, he has to recite padāiš yā and bring namāz to the zōhr. With the third step, he has (to recite) frasrūtā īžaiiā̊, bring namāz to the zōhr and go to the place of the ābardān and recite: pairi.jasāi. ..."
